name: humidity_decrease
description: This function is used to lower the humidity level of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to lower the humidity level.

parameters.name: ration
parameters.description: The percentage value to decrease the humidity by.

parameters.name: humidityDelta
parameters.description: The amount by which to decrease the humidity.
